file_content.text: My crew's hard at work. No one's stopping until the ark's complete.
Veedrig and his little toady are close by. You can't miss them.
Republic, huh? Don't know what you're doing on Makeb, but thanks. These Cartel idiots won't listen to reason.
I try calling for help and get a blaster shoved in my face. The Hutts work us to death, treat us like slaves--no, like animals!
We're here to commandeer the ark for the people of Makeb. Once it's secure, you and your men will be freed.
We'll save you and the ark.
We're working eighteen-hour days, no breaks, no visits home....
You stood up to that Cartel thug pretty well. What's your name?
Who are you?
Tiero. I'm foreman here, for what it's worth. You saw what happens when I try to do my blasted job.
It's all on Veedrig's orders. My men break their backs building his ark while he steals everything not bolted down.
We're here for the ark, not your laundry list of complaints.
Stop whining.
Sure. Why would anybody listen to the foreman?
Thanks to Veedrig, the ark's weeks behind schedule. My crew can't finish the ship while that slimy Devaronian's selling off its components.
First the Hutt Cartel betrays Makeb, now their contractor betrays them. Their greed will ruin them both.
The Hutts deserve his deceit.
I'd love to see the Hutts catch Veedrig red-handed, but I'll settle for you.
Veedrig's locked himself in here for more than safety. He's covering up his deception so his Hutt employers don't find out.
That explains his secrecy.
He even bribed the guards. But you can expose him, Master Jedi.
Veedrig's scam is about to end. When we neutralize him, be ready to work.
I'll put us back on schedule.
You actually want the ark completed? I suppose we can do that.
Takes a steady hand to steal from the Hutts. Depending on his skill, Veedrig will either get himself killed or make a fortune.
That's a risky scam.
Snakes always manage to slither out of trouble. But you can stop this one.
Veedrig. Fast talker, horns on his head, likes kissing up to Hutts?
I know that name.
Oh, you know him.
That stupid Devaronian may have doomed the whole planet. I'll make sure he dies first.
Veedrig will pay for this.
Don't let him talk his way out of this. He's good at the chatter.
I'll tell my crew to lay low. Put Veedrig in his place, and we'll help you out however we can.
Watch out!
